Title: Requires physicians subject to proceedings for medical misconduct or actions for medical malpractice to include information regarding such proceedings and actions on advertisements
Summary: Requires physicians subject to proceedings for medical misconduct or actions for medical malpractice to include information regarding such proceedings and actions on advertisements.
LawCode: Add ยง230-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to advertisements by physicians subject to proceedings for medical misconduct and actions for medical malpractice
